title: american horror story asylum - smart Pepper confronts doctor arden opening scene
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: I feel like pepper got justice, not only by having a new baby to protect, but also to gain the ability to stand up for herself
It is ironic that Pepper is so salty.
Asylum is the most intriguing season hands down. And to me the aliens were brilliant storyline that rarely anybody understood
I love that she says "you'll see first hand how people treat us freaks," as in Freak Show...
Pepper aint got time for your shit...
